modName: Snow Roads Fix for Snow and Rocks TEXTURE HD
summary: Snow Roads Fix for Snow and Rocks TEXTURE HD by darevix
descriptionHtml:
Snow Roads Fix for Snow and Rocks TEXTURE HD

========================================================================================

This fixes the Snow Roads Snow Texture for Snow and Rocks TEXTURE HD by darevix. It seems like the Vanilla Snow was used in between the Stones in the Road, resulting in a missmatch between the surrounding Snow and Snow Roads.

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Installation:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

1) Download and install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1382] Snow and Rocks TEXTURE HD[/url] by darevix.
2) Install the Fix and click "yes" when asked to overwrite.

Make sure you pick the right download as Snow and Rocks TEXTURE HD has a 2048 and 1024 version.

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Credits and Special Thanks:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

darevix for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1382]Snow and Rocks TEXTURES HD[/url]
author: Lunyra

files.name: Snow Roads Fix - 1024
files.changelogHtml:
Added 1024 version.
Saved the Color Textures as DXT1 without Alpha Channel.

files.name: Snow Roads Fix - 2048
files.changelogHtml:
Added 1024 version.
Saved the Color Textures as DXT1 without Alpha Channel.
